maqras.text: cng sæsxng sdudi phranam hæng phracea khxng cea phuthrng sungsud ying
phuthrng srang læw thrng thahı smburn
læa phuthrng kahnd sphawa læw thrng chinæa thang
læa phuthrng na thung hya xxk ma (hı ngxkngey pen xahar khxng psusatw)
læw thrng thahı man sang hæng si khla mxsx
rea ca sxn hı cea xan læw cea ca mi lum
wentæ sing thi xallxhˌ thrng prasngkh thæcring phraxngkh thrng rxbru sing thi peidphey læa sing thi sxn ren
læa rea ca thahı penkar ngayday kæ cea sung bayyati sasna xan ngayday
dangnan cng takteuxn kan theid pheraa kar takteuxn kan nan ca yang khun prayochn
phu thi hwan klaw ca di raluk
læa phu thi chawcha ying ca hlik leiyng kar takteuxn nan
sung khea ca kheapi phea him nı fi kxng hıy
læw khea ca mi tay nı nan læa ca mi pen dwy
nænxn phu thi khadkela tnxeng yxm brrlu khwam sarec
læa khea raluk thung phranam hæng phracea khxng khea læw khea tha lahmad
Hamidi tæ phwk cea leuxk xeakar mi chiwit xyu nı lok ni tanghak
thang «thi prlok nan di kwa læa cirang kwa
thæcring (khx takteuxn sti) ni mi xyu nı khamphir kxn «ma læw
khux khamphir khx ngxi brxhim læa mu sa
khawkhraw khxng kar khrxbnga (hæng khwam runræng) di mayang cea læw michı hrux
nı wan nan mi hlay bıhna thi tatxy
bıhna thi thangan hnak raka cı
kheapi phea him nı fi xan rxn ræng
ca thuk hı dum cak naphu thi rxn cad
mimi xahar xun nxkcak tn hnam hæng
man ca mi thahı xwn læa mi thahı hay hiw
nı wan nan mi hlay bıhna thi beikban
phung phxcı pheraa kark ra tha khxng phwk khea
xyu nı swn swrrkh xan sung trahngan
ca mi diyin reuxng ri sara nı nan
nı nan mi tana hil rin
nı nan mi teiyng thi thuk ykwi sung den
læa mi kæw na thuk wang wi
læa mi hmxn xing thuk reiyng wi pen thæw
læa mi phrm xyang di leis thuk pu wi
phwk khea mi phicarna du xuth dxk hrux wa man thuk bangkeid ma xyangri
læa (mi phicarna du) yang thxngfa bang hrux wa man thuk yk hı sung khun xyangri
læa (mi phicarna du) yang phukhea bang hrux wa man thuk pak tang wi xyangri
læa (mi phicarna du) yang phændin bang hrux wa man thuk phæ lad wi xyangri
dangnan cng takteuxn theid pheraa thæcring cea pen pheiyng phu takteuxn theanan
cea michı phu mi xanac henux phwk khea
nxkcak phu thi phinhlanghı læa ptiseth sraththa theanan
xallxhˌ ca thrng lngthosʹ khea sung kar lngthosʹ xan mhant
thæcring yang rea theanan khux kark lab ma khxng phwk khea
læw k thæcring hnathi khxng rea nan khux kar chara phwk khea
khx saban dwy yam rungxrun
læa dwy khakhun thang sib
læa dwy sing thi pen khu læa thi pen khi
læa dwy wela klangkhun meux man khocr pi
nı dang klaw nan penkar saban sahrab phu thi mi payya michı hrux
cea mi hen dxk hrux wa phracea khxng cea kratha tx phwk xa dxy ang ri
(hæng) xir xm phwk mi sea hin sung ta hngan
Sung yeiyng nan midi thuk srang tam hawmeuxng tang «
læa phwk sa mud phu skad hin n hubkhea
læa fir xea nˌ cea hæng trung sea tenth
brrda phu lameid hela nan tam hawmeuxng tang «
læw kx khwam seiyhay xyang makmay nı hawmeuxng hela nan
dangnan phracea khxng cea cung krahna kar lngthosʹ nana chnid bn phwk khea
thæcring phracea khxng cea nan thrng fea du xyang nænxn
swn mnusʹy nan meux phracea khxng khea thrng thdsxb khea doy thrng hı keiyrti khea læa thrng pordpran khea khea k ca klaw wa phracea khxng chanth rng ykyxng chan
tæ khrang meux phraxngkh thrng thdsxb khea thrng hıkar khrxng chiph khxng khea pen thi khabkhæb kæ khea khea k ca klaw wa phracea khxng chanth rng heyiydhyam chan
michı chen nan dxk tæwa phwk cea midi hı keiyrti kæ dek kaphra tanghak
læa phwk cea midi sngserim kan nı kar hı xahar kæ khn yakcn khadsn
læa phwk cea kin mrdk kan xyang hmd keliyng
læa phwk cea rak smbati kan xyang makmay
hamidi meux phændin thuk thahı san satheuxn pen phuyphng
læa phracea khxng cea sedc ma phrxm thang ma la xik ahˌ dwy pen thæw «
læa wan nan nrk yahannam ca thuk na ma hı prakt nı wan nan mnusʹy ca raluk khun ma di tæ kar raluk nan ca mi phl kæ khea di xyangri
khea ca klaw wa xo tha chan di thakhwam di wi lwnghna sahrab chiwit khxng chan
læw nı wan nan mimi phu dı lngthosʹ chen kar lngthosʹ khxng phraxngkh
læa mimi phu dı phukmad chen kar phukmad khxng phraxngkh
xo chiwit thi sngb næn xey
cng klab mayang phracea khxng cea dwy khwam yindi læa pen thi piti theid
læw cng khea ma xyu nı hmu pwng baw khxng kha theid
læa cng khea ma xyu nı swn swrrkh khxng kha theid
